review: If you are looking for Best Dentist & Dental Clinic in Dwarka for any Dental Treatment then Dr Piyush ***** ** *********** *** **** ******* ** ***** ** *** ****** ****** ** ******* I was in terrible teeth pain and wanted to get my missing tooth replaced with Dental Implants but was afraid of visiting a Dentist due to fear of pain during treatment and also due to huge cost involved. I searched online & read about Dr Piyush Malik but still looked for recommendations for my friends and neighbours in my Society and everyone recommended me Dentist Dr Piyush Malik. I took appointment and visited the clinic and was warmly greeted by staff at Reception and the clinic was very clean and hygienic. I met Dr Piyush Malik during consultation and he listened to all my problems very calmly and patiently and did a through check up and explained me in detail about the various treatments required in a very simple language using various educative teeth models , charts and videos and answered all my questions and doubts in a very easy to understand language. After consultation I can say with guarantee that he is the most friendly Doctor I ever consulted in my life and I decided to get my advised Root Canal Treatment with Tooth Crown , Teeth Fillings , Scaling and Polishing, Dental Implant , Dental Bridge treatments, Teeth Bleaching, Teeth Veneering , Wisdom Tooth Extraction , Teeth Whitening started in a planned manner. My teeth pain vanished only after first sitting of my RCT treatment and I was completely relaxed during the treatment which was painless and all my fears went away in first sitting of my treatment itself. The instruments , machines and materials used on me were latest and world's best and I could see proper care had been taken to sterilize the instruments and machines so that no infection is spread from one patient to another. All my treatments were painless and the treatment charges were also very affordable. After my treatment was over my parents also got Root Canal Treatment and Dentures made from Dr Piyush Malik and my brother also got Dental Aligners Treatment for his misaligned teeths and my sister got Dental Braces treatment done from Dr Piyush. All my family members are happy and satisfied with his Dental treatment and we have recommended lots of family and friends to his Dental Clinic in Dwarka and they all have been very happy and satisfied with the affordable painless quality Dental Treatment they received from highly experienced Dr Piyush Malik. I would 100% recommend Dr Piyush Malik ** ****** ******* *** * **** ******* ** ****** ***** and would recommend everyone to visit him at his Dental Clinic in Dwarka Delhi for a fearless and pain free Dental Treatment at Affordable cost.

review: For a person who has had Dental Phobia all her life , my experience with Dr Piyush Malik was very comforting. I had Teeth Cleaning / Scaling , Teeth Whitening / Bleaching , Root Canal Treatment RCT , Zirconia Crowns / Caps , Implants, Tooth Extraction , Dental Cavity Fillings , Bridge , Wisdom Tooth Extraction done by Dr Piyush Malik at his Dental Clinic in Dwarka and I am amazed by the results. I love my pearly whites after the treatment and getting used to all the compliments after the treatment. Dr Piyush is really Competent * ************* * Friendly and efficient . I highly recommend him to all those who have Dental Phobias he made me overcome mine very patiently. He makes sure to explain everything with ease and is aware of latest and new technology and works for giving you the best possible painless treatment at reasonable cost. He has successfully done those Dental treatments like Implants , RCT and saved teeth in my relatives cases which were refused by many Dentist and that too without pain and at reasonable cost. My whole family , neighbours and Relatives visit his Dental Clinic for all there Dental problems and all of them are happy and satisfied with his treatments. Dental Clinic is very clean , hygenic with proper sterilization of machines and instruments and is well equipped with latest technology to ensure one gets best treatment . My children got Braces and Aligners treatment from Dr Piyush Malik and now there teeth are in perfect shape *** **** **** *** *** **** ******* ** ****** *** ***** ** ********** * *** *** *** *** **** ****** ****** ** ****** as three generation of our family have been visiting Dr Piyush Malik for all the Dental Treatments with full faith and satisfaction and most importantly we appreciate Dr Piyush honesty and transparency as two teeth of my father had cavities for which he was told Root Canal Treatment and Crowns by a Dentist but Dr Piyush fixed them conservatively with fillings and we really like his post treatment care . My Mother Dentures were made by him and now she can eat & smile comfortably from the Dentures without any discomfort and they look so natural that no one is able to tell that she is having artificial teeth. The best thing about Dr Piyush is his proactiveness , be it anytime I pinged / called him , he was always there to help me out with my queries and we always feel that we are in safest hands upon getting our Dental treatment done from him. My whole family including relatives and neighbours would highly recommend Dr Piyush Malik blindly for any Dental Treatment as now he is a family Dentist for all of us since more than 15 years now

review:
Dr Piyush Malik is an Exceptionally skilled , caring *** **** ******* ** ****** * *** ****** ****** ** **** ****** ****** ** ****** ** ****** ** His Expertise and care is unmatched & he offers expert Dental Treatment with precision & compassion. I highly recommend him for best Dental Treatment & a comfortable pain free experience. Dr Piyush took time to explain every procedure he was doing and he did not rush into the process of RCT plus Cap / Crown & took multiple sittings to cure it properly so that it last of a lifetime. He explains all the pros & cons of the treatment so that we can make an independent decision. I got my wisdom tooth extracted / removed and he did it so skillfully that I did not experience any pain during and after the tooth removal / extraction. I have been to quite a few Dentist but all of them were misguiding me to many other treatments to make extra money but Dr Piyush gave a accurate diagnosis at a reasonable & affordable cost and never misguides to make extra money. My mother got her teeth cleaning / Scaling,  Teeth Whitening, Dental Teeth Fillings, Root Canal Treatment plus Cap / Crown, two Dental Teeth Implants and Wisdom Tooth and other teeth Extraction done by Dr Piyush Malik at affordable cost and whole treatment was painless, sucessful & she was in safest hands for her Dental Treatment in Dwarka. My father got Night Guards, Re RCT , Caps / Crowns , Dental Bridge & Three Dental Implants, gum disease treatment, few decayed tooth Extraction/ removal, few cavity fillings , teeth cleaning & polishing, Zirconia Crowns / Zirconia Caps, Teeth Whitening , Invisalign Aligners at a affordable cost and above all the treatment was completely painless and now he is able to eat everything from his teeths. My grandfather reached his clinic in extreme pain and was relieved of his pain instantly after the first sitting of Root Canal Treatment and he also got Dentures made by Dr Piyush and he is now able to eat his food comfortably, his bleeding gums and foul smell from mouth problem was also cured by Dr Piyush. I myself got composite veneers & Braces done also and now my teeth are straight and my smile looks much much better. The clinic is very clean and hygienic and proper care is given to sterilize the machine and instruments after every patient to prevent cross patient infection & clinic is equipped with worlds best machines , Facilities and technology. My family have referred all our relatives and neighbours to Dr Piyush for there Dental Treatment and all have been happy & satisfied after getting painless affordable quality Dental Treatment due to his expertise at his Dental Clinic in Dwarka and Dr Piyush is very friendly polite and is always available on call / watsapp also to address any query or doubt regarding the treatment. * *** **** *** **** ****** *** **** ** **** ****** ****** ** ****** *** would recommend everyone to visit the Dental Clinic in Dwarka for any Dental problem. Dr Piyush removed all my phobias about Dental Treatment and put me at ease on the first day of my treatment itself as I was scared of visiting a Dentist for my Dental Treatment and I and my whole family have been visiting him for more than 16 years now *** * *** *********** *** **** ** ** *** **** ******* ** ****** * would recommend everyone to visit once to feel the expertise as I myself have seen many family members and a lot known people who were in great pain and were scared of visiting a Dentist for there Dental Treatment but after visiting Dr Piyush there phobias, pain vanished and infact they now go for there regular checkup to Dr Piyush for keeping there teeths healthy as he also provides lot of helpful information & tips about how to keep teeths healthy forever.
Highly Recommended * **** ******* ** ******* *** ******Wish him very Best * **** ****** ****** ** ******* *** ***** 
Thankyou Dr Piyush Malik
